name: Time-Out Escape
description:
Thanks for visiting my gamepage.

This game is my first Unity 3D game, created for the GameDev.TV Community Jam of may 2020.

Some info about the game:

You will enter The Room where you will earn gametickets by playing arcade-ish games. After a while you will have enough tickets to take on The End Game.. You have 60 minutes to escape The Room and crown yourself King of the Time-Out-Escape world..

Are you ready for it?

Played with FPS controller so should feel familiar :-)

Btw, if you find 5 mins, please comment with your findings.. It will give me insights to improve for my next games :-)
